Head of Research (Machine Learning):We are a stealth-mode biotech startup based in the California Bay Area with a mission to accelerate clinical trials through our cutting-edge digital twin technology. We are seeking a highly experienced Head of Research (ML) to join our team and lead the strategic direction of the group while providing strong hands-on guidance. This is position is equivalent to a Sr. Manager or Director, and will report directly to the VP of Engineering.Responsibilities of Head of Research (ML):Lead the companies cutting edge research and present our work at conferences Lead the strategic direction and technical vision of the Machine Learning/ Software groupsProvide technical leadership and guidance on a diverse set of complex projectsMentor and develop team members to reach their full potentialWe offer a competitive salary and benefits package, including health insurance, 401k, and stock options. If you are a driven and talented leader with a passion for driving innovation in the biotech industry, we want to hear from you!
